body.raw:
--batch_B1
Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary=changeset_CS1

--changeset_CS1
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary
Content-ID: 1

POST {{GlobalWebApiUrl}}contacts  HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "firstname": "Batch",
  "lastname": "Riquelme1"
}

--changeset_CS1
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary
Content-ID: 2

POST {{GlobalWebApiUrl}}contacts  HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "firstname": "Batch",
  "lastname": "Riquelme2"
}

--changeset_CS1
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding:binary
Content-ID: 3

POST {{GlobalWebApiUrl}}contacts  HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "firstname": "Batch",
  "lastname": "Riquelme3"
}

--changeset_CS1--
--batch_B1--

request.description: Executes a batch operation within a transaction

body.raw:
--batch_fetch
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET {{GlobalWebApiUrl}}contacts?fetchXml=<fetch count="10" ><entity name="contact" ><attribute name="fullname" /></entity></fetch> HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json;type=entry

--batch_fetch--

request.description: Executes a batch operation containing a FetchXML to workaround the URI limit ("Invalid URI: The Uri scheme is too long")
